meta.name: description
meta.content: Provide exceptional educational experiences for students, staff, and the community by building an organization where people are inspired to be leaders and committed to life-long learning.

h2.a: Welcome to Keyes Union School District

div.div: Keyes Union School District welcomes campus visitations by parents and community members and encourages strong parent involvement throughout all of our schools. Keyes Union School District employees, working in collaboration with county officials, public and private agencies, business leaders, service clubs, and parents, are committed to providing the best education for the youth of the communities we serve.

img.alt: Distance Learning - Acknowledgement & Consent Featured Photo

div.div: Please review the distance learning online platforms that may be utilized for your student(s) education during the closure.

The health and wellbeing of our students and employees are a top priority, and Keyes Union School District recognizes the importance of a proactive response. This webpage provides information and resources to keep our community updated on the latest coronavirus (COVID-19) developments.
Provide exceptional educational experiences for students, staff, and the community by building an organization where people are inspired to be leaders and committed to life-long learning.
